content: Hi all, Im new here!! Im having trouble understanding something about smart on fhir. I want to know how i to pass the patient or practitioner into the launch flow. Can anyone help me? Thanks a lot!
If you use the launch/patient scope you get BACK a patient from the launch flow
If you use openid fhirUser scopes you get back the user details from the launch flow - that can be a practitioner or patient (or maybe a person) depending on the server

Hello Everyone, I'm very new to SMART on FHIR and learning the stuff. I'm looking on implementing Smart on FHIR Authorization Server with the ability to talk to an external IDP for Authentication utilizing SAML/ Open ID. Are there any sample java implementations that I can look to get started at or any thoughts on how to go about it would be greatly appreciated!

There is a dedicated stream for SMART - #smart
You may be able to get better responses there
